section.title: xnxfyi.F
section.programlisting: 00001 *CMZ : 23/05/2000 15.28.48 by Federico Carminati 00002 *-- Author : 00003 PROGRAM xnxfyi 00004 ************************************************************************ 00005 * * 00006 * Loads fission fragment indipendent yields and fission neutron * 00007 * multiplicities from ENDF-6 database files. The American, * 00008 * European and Japanese databases are scanned in turn to load * 00009 * fissile isotopes information in order of scan * 00010 * * 00011 ************************************************************************ 00012 #include "xctab1.inc" 00013 #include "xcfisb.inc" 00014 #include "xcroot.inc" 00015 CHARACTER*(2) CHELSY(118) /'H','He','Li','Be','B','C','N','O', 00016 + 'F','Ne','Na','Mg','Al','Si','P','S','Cl','Ar','K','Ca', 00017 + 'Sc','Ti','V','Cr','Mn','Fe','Co','Ni','Cu','Zn','Ga','Ge', 00018 + 'As','Se','Br','Kr','Rb','Sr','Y','Zr','Nb','Mo','Tc','Ru', 00019 + 'Rh','Pd','Ag','Cd','In','Sn','Sb','Te','I','Xe','Cs','Ba', 00020 + 'La','Ce','Pr','Nd','Pm','Sm','Eu','Gd','Tb','Dy','Ho', 00021 + 'Er','Tm','Yb','Lu','Hf','Ta','W','Re','Os','Ir','Pt','Au', 00022 + 'Hg','Tl','Pb','Bi','Po','At','Rn','Fr','Ra','Ac','Th', 00023 + 'Pa','U','Np','Pu','Am','Cm','Bk','Cf','Es','Fm','Md','No', 00024 + 'Lr','Rf','Db','Sg','Bh','Hs','Mt','Ds','Rg','Cn','Nh', 00025 + 'Fl','Mc','Lv','Ts','Og' / 00026 CHARACTER*(14) CHELNM(118) /'Hydrogen','Helium','Lithium', 00027 + 'Beryllium','Boron','Carbon','Nitrogen','Oxygen', 00028 + 'Fluorine','Neon','Sodium','Magnesium','Aluminium', 00029 + 'Silicon','Phosphorus','Sulfur','Chlorine','Argon', 00030 + 'Potassium','Calcium','Scandium','Titanium','Vanadium', 00031 + 'Chromium','Manganese','Iron','Cobalt','Nickel','Copper', 00032 + 'Zinc','Gallium','Germanium','Arsenic','Selenium', 00033 + 'Bromine','Krypton','Rubidium','Strontium','Yttrium', 00034 + 'Zirconium','Niobium','Molybdenum','Technetium', 00035 + 'Ruthenium','Rhodium','Palladium','Silver','Cadmium', 00036 + 'Indium','Tin','Antimony','Tellurium','Iodine','Xenon', 00037 + 'Caesium','Barium','Lanthanum','Cerium','Praseodymium', 00038 + 'Neodymium','Promethium','Samarium','Europium','Gadolinium', 00039 + 'Terbium','Dysprosium','Holmium','Erbium','Thulium', 00040 + 'Ytterbium','Lutetium','Hafnium','Tantalum','Tungsten', 00041 + 'Rhenium','Osmium','Iridium','Platinum','Gold','Mercury', 00042 + 'Thallium','Lead','Bismuth','Polonium','Astatine','Radon', 00043 + 'Francium','Radium','Actinium','Thorium','Protactinium', 00044 + 'Uranium','Neptunium','Plutonium','Americium','Curium', 00045 + 'Berkelium','Californium','Einsteinium','Fermium', 00046 + 'Mendelevium','Nobelium','Lawrencium','Rutherfordium', 00047 + 'Dubnium','Seaborgium','Bohrium','Hassium','Meitnerium', 00048 + 'Darmstadtium','Roentgenium','Copernicium','Nihonium', 00049 + 'Flerovium','Moscovium','Livermorium','Tennessine', 00050 + 'Oganesson'/ 00051 00052 parameter(maxfyi=3,maxnuf=3) 00053 CHARACTER*124 CHFINP(MAXFYI), CHNINP(MAXNUF) 00054 CHARACTER*(*) CHCOMP 00055 CHARACTER*80 CLINE 00056 CHARACTER*80 COUFIL 00057 parameter(maxbnl=3500) 00058 * ---> Minimum yield accepted 00059 * Allowing smaller yields makes little sense as the 00060 * cumulative probability sum is performed in a single 00061 * precision variable. Even if this variable were 00062 * double precision, still a double precision random 00063 * number generator would be needed to disentangle 00064 * smaller fission yields. 00065 * 00066 parameter(fyitol=1e-6) 00067 parameter(chcomp='xnnloa.dat') 00068 dimension izabnl(maxbnl) 00069 LOGICAL LDEBUG,LCOMP 00070 DATA ldebug /.true./ 00071 LOGICAL LFIRST 00072 SAVE lfirst 00073 DATA lfirst / .true. / 00074 * 00075 *----------------------------------------------------------------------- 00076 * 00077 CHARACTER*255 ARG(100) /100*''/ 00078 00079 nfiles = iargc() 00080 IF(nfiles .GE. 100) THEN 00081 WRITE(*,*) 'Can convert only 100 files at a time' 00082 stop 00083 ENDIF 00084 IF(ldebug) THEN 00085 DO i = 1, nfiles 00086 CALL getarg(i, arg(i)) 00087 WRITE (*,*) arg(i)(1:lnblnk(arg(i))) 00088 END DO 00089 END IF 00090 * ---> Loop over all databases 00091 DO 220 ifile = 1, nfiles 00092 lfinp=lnblnk(arg(ifile)) 00093 * ---> Check whether compressed file is there 00094 INQUIRE(file=arg(ifile),exist=lcomp) 00095 IF(.NOT.lcomp) THEN 00096 WRITE(*,*) 'File ',arg(ifile)(:lfinp), 00097 + ' does not exist' 00098 GOTO 220 00099 ENDIF 00100 * ---> Close files (should not be needed, but it does not harm) 00101 CLOSE(12) 00102 CLOSE(14) 00103 IF(ldebug) THEN 00104 WRITE(6,'('' Now opening '',A)') arg(ifile)(:lfinp) 00105 ENDIF 00106 * ---> Open database 00107 OPEN(12,file=arg(ifile)(:lfinp),status='OLD',action='READ') 00108 * ---> Preset previous mat code 00109 mathol = -1 00110 * ---> Read a new section in ENDF 6 format 00111 40 CALL xnnews(c1, c2, l1, l2, n1, n2, math, mfh, mth) 00112 * ---> If end of file exit loop 00113 IF(math.LT.0) GOTO 220 00114 IF(math.NE.mathol) THEN 00115 * ---> Reading new material 00116 IF(ldebug) THEN 00117 WRITE(6,'('' Loading Z='',I3,'' A='',I3)') nint(c1/ 00118 + 1000.) ,nint(mod(c1,1000.)) 00119 ENDIF 00120 mathol=math 00121 izap = nint(c1) 00122 * ---> Independent Fission Yield section 00123 izp = izap/1000-85 00124 iap = mod(izap,1000)-2*izap/1000 00125 IF((izp.LT.1.OR.izp.GT.maxizp).OR. 00126 * ---> If Z smaller than 85 or A smaller than 2*Z skip element 00127 + (iap.LT.1.OR.iap.GT.maxiap)) THEN 00128 WRITE(6,10100) izap/1000,mod(izap,1000),izp,iap 00129 * ---> If Z smaller than 85 or A smaller than 2*Z skip element 00130 GOTO 40 00131 ENDIF 00132 WRITE(coufil,'(I4,''_'',I4''_'',A,''.dat'')') izap/1000, 00133 + mod(izap,1000),chelnm(izap/1000) 00134 ic=1 00135 DO j=1,lnblnk(coufil) 00136 IF(coufil(j:j) .NE. ' ') THEN 00137 coufil(ic:ic)=coufil(j:j) 00138 ic = ic+1 00139 coufil(j:j)=' ' 00140 ENDIF 00141 ENDDO 00142 WRITE(*,*) coufil(:lnblnk(coufil)) 00143 OPEN(14,file=coufil(:lnblnk(coufil)),status='NEW',action='WRITE') 00144 WRITE(14,'(''G4NDL'')') 00145 ENDIF 00146 * ---> Analyse section just read 00147 IF(mfh.EQ.1.AND.mth.EQ.451) THEN 00148 * ---> Comment section, get the isomeric state 00149 READ(12,11000) elis,sta,lis,liso,idumm,nfor 00150 izap=10*izap+liso 00151 * ---> Write version of the file 00152 DO j=1,5 00153 READ(12,'(A)') cline 00154 END DO 00155 WRITE(14,'(A)') cline(5:22) 00156 GO TO 40 00157 ELSEIF(mfh.EQ.8.AND.(mth.EQ.454.OR.mth.EQ.459)) THEN 00158 WRITE(14,'(I14)') mth 00159 WRITE(14,'(I14)') mfh 00160 WRITE(14,'(ES14.6)') c2 00161 * ---> Load number of input energies 00162 le1=l1 00163 * ---> This is a mess. For some reason L1 on the following line is LE1-1 00164 * so G4 wants L1 of the second line, which is the header of the LIST 00165 * record -- we oblige 00166 WRITE(14,'(I14)') le1-1 00167 * ---> Load number of energy points for every fission product 00168 izapnt(izp,iap,2) = le1 00169 IF(ldebug) THEN 00170 WRITE(6,10300) le1 00171 ENDIF 00172 * ---> Set number of fission products to 0 00173 ndata = 0 00174 * ---> Set lost probability to 0 00175 bnlost = 0. 00176 * ---> Loop over different energy yield lists 00177 DO 110 jene=1,le1 00178 CALL xnlist 00179 * ---> Load energy 00180 IF(le1-1 .NE. l1) THEN 00181 WRITE(6, 00182 + '(''File '',A,'' MTH '',I4,'' Energy no '',I4,'' LE1='',I4, 00183 + '' and L1='',I4)') 00184 + coufil(:lnblnk(coufil)),mth,jene,le1,l1 00185 stop 00186 ENDIF 00187 WRITE(14,'(ES14.6)') c1 00188 WRITE(14,'(I14)') np 00189 WRITE(14,'(I14)') l1 00190 IF(ldebug) THEN 00191 WRITE(6,10400) jene,c1,n1,np 00192 ENDIF 00193 * ---> Loop over all fission fragments 00194 DO 100 je=1,n1-3,4 00195 * ---> Get IZA of FF 00196 zafp= xnrval(je ) 00197 * ---> Floating point (iso) state designator 00198 fps = xnrval(je+1) 00199 * ---> Get yield 00200 yi = xnrval(je+2) 00201 * ---> Get also error on yield, not used 00202 dyi = xnrval(je+3) 00203 * ---> Build composed isomer code of fission fragment 00204 izam = nint(zafp*10+fps) 00205 100 CONTINUE 00206 WRITE(14,'(2(I14,I14,ES14.6))') (nint(xnrval(4*(j-1)+1)), 00207 + nint(xnrval(4*(j-1)+2)),xnrval(4*(j-1)+3),j=1,np) 00208 110 CONTINUE 00209 * ---> Loop back to next ENDF-6 section 00210 GOTO 40 00211 ENDIF 00212 * 00213 220 CONTINUE 00214 stop 00215 10000 FORMAT(' *** XNLOAN: Space used ',i6,' words ') 00216 * 00217 10100 FORMAT(' Out-of-bound fission yield! Z/A ',i2.2,'/',i3.3, 00218 +' IZP/IAP ',i4,'/',i4) 00219 10200 FORMAT(' Fissionable nuclide ',i2,'-',i3,' already in table') 00220 10300 FORMAT(' Apparently found ',i4,' sections ') 00221 10400 FORMAT(' Section ',i4,' with energy ',e11.4,' Sec = ',i5, 00222 + ' Points = ',i5) 00223 10500 FORMAT(' Now loaded ',i10,' points') 00224 10600 FORMAT(' Points reduced to ',i10) 00225 10700 FORMAT(' Out-of-bound neutron multiplicity! Z/A ',i2.2,'/', 00226 + i3.3,' IZP/IAP ',i4,'/',i4) 00227 10800 FORMAT(' Fissionable nuclide ',i2,'-',i3,' already in table') 00228 10900 FORMAT(' Apparently found section ',i4,' with ',i6,' points') 00229 11000 FORMAT(2e11.4,4i11,i4,i2,i3) 00230 11100 FORMAT(6e11.4,i4,i2,i3,i5) 00231 11200 FORMAT(i10,10x,i10,50x) 00232 11300 FORMAT(8i10) 00233 999 END
